about_the_game:
This experiment was coming to a close, but it seems that we underestimated the uncontrollable factors of our plan.
We must set right what is wrong. We must control what is unexpected.

ICEY's absence has allowed UCEY to reach the peak of her lawlessness.

In order to prevent UCEY from obtaining self-awareness,

new stages and plot have been added.

That's right. Everything is to let the black star rise as usual.
detailed_description:
This experiment was coming to a close, but it seems that we underestimated the uncontrollable factors of our plan.
We must set right what is wrong. We must control what is unexpected.

ICEY's absence has allowed UCEY to reach the peak of her lawlessness.

In order to prevent UCEY from obtaining self-awareness,

new stages and plot have been added.

That's right. Everything is to let the black star rise as usual.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Lion 10.7, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Lion 10.7, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: ICEY - UCEY's Awakening

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: This experiment was coming to a close, but it seems that we underestimated the uncontrollable factors of our plan. We must set right what is wrong. We must control what is unexpected. ICEY's absence has allowed UCEY to reach the peak of her lawlessness.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, French
*languages with full audio support
